snippet: Nine people were charged after Sunday’s derby between Manchester City and Manchester United, the police said.
abstract: Nine soccer fans face charges in connection with trouble at derby between Manchester City and Manchester United as police try to identify who threw coin that hit United defender Rio Ferdinand.
lead_paragraph: Nine people were charged after Sunday’s derby between Manchester City and Manchester United, the police said.

headline.seo: Nine Fans Face Charges After Manchester Derby
headline.main: Nine Fans Face Charges After Manchester Derby
